ing: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
1 tablespoon whipped cream topping, or to taste (optional)
des: "Who needs store-bought when you have a kitchen? With a baby and a dog, I don't have time for pumpkin puree, just need something to kick start my morning and put me in a good mood. I'm sure you'll share the feeling after you try this super-ample, super-fast, and super-cheap treat!"
ins:
Mix half-and-half, sugar, and pumpkin pie spice together in a coffee mug. Pour coffee into mug; stir to blend.
Heat in microwave until hot, about 15 seconds. Top with whipped cream.
